show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Americans Accept Their ConditionRats Don’t
content:
Studies have shown that when rats are fed a typical American diet rich in GMO, they become sluggish and apathetic in… contrast to those fed a typical “rat diet” of unprocessed food like ground corn and fish meal.
This probably explains Americans’ apathy to outrageous behavior on the part of the State.
Word to the wise: stay away from glyphosate.
Stock market comment du jour.
A genuine housing recovery is only possible with genuine home buyers.
They are currently absent.
The Netherlands resents having to shovel their money to the weaker southern European countries.
Americans encouraged to snitch on each other.
Bank lending has been ramping up to record levels.
Spending in America: the national pastime.
The mainstream media were ordered to ignore the Bunkerville, Nevada standoff vs the federal land grab and cattle theft operation.
They complied…
